name: Latest News Ticker for WordPress
author: Shane Jones

sections.description:
Latest news ticker lets you have a ticker on the bottom of your site showing the latest posts. Imagine breaking news for your blog…

This is the lite version of Latest News Ticker, for the version with a ton of other features please see Latest News Ticker Pro

Pro version includes many features including colour themes and further cusomisations
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

Alternatively head to the plugins page in your WordPress backend and Search for \”Latest News Ticker\”
sections.changelog:

– Changes to footer
 
v1.2 – Changes to admin page

v1.21 – Further changes to admin page

v1.3 – Cleaned up code and added admin template

v1.31 – Auto pop email for signups

v1.32 – Bugfix for WordPress 3.6
– Deactivation bits

v1.33 – Removing Footer links 

v1.34 – Bug fixing

v1.35 – Removing an error if both the free and premium versions are both activated.
